unnormalised: Arre, pesticides! Gotta be careful, no? Remember what happened in Bhopal. My Nani always said wash veggies well, especially before Onam sadhya! Too much pesticide, even Basmati rice won't taste good. Farmers in Punjab also facing big issues. Need better solutions, like the IARI is researching. Gotta protect Bharat Mata!
